overview: Fleetglobal - ServiÃ§os Globais a Empresas na Ãrea das Frotas, S.A. specializes in the information supply, consultancy, and solutions for the automobile market. It offers automobile fleet management optimization consultancy and outsourcing services. The company also supplies market intelligence, data, applications, and e-commerce platforms. Its products include NCBook, which provides information of new vehicles in the market; MSBook, an application to estimate the preventive and corrective maintenance costs of vehicles in the market; UCB Benchmark, which is a monthly study with the analysis of the used car sales performance of a fleet management company; Pricing benchmark, a report that analyzes the pricing of each fleet management company and compares it with the competition; UCBook that provides evaluation of used vehicles based on the market transactions; RVBook, an application that allows to estimate residual values of the vehicles commercialized in the local market; ContractManager, software used to manage the activities of an operational and financial leasing company; and FleetPlus, a software that allows companies to manage the complexity of the management of their own fleet. Fleetglobal serves operational and financial leasing companies, manufacturers, retailers, rent a car companies, insurance companies, media, and consumers. The company is based in Lisbon, Portugal.
